alert.note: Alert for Custer; Hooker; Logan; Thomas; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 10:31AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Hooker, Thomas, Logan, Custer and Western Cherry Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Thursday to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind gusts today may lead to areas of blowing snow from existing snow pack in addition to new snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Hooker; Logan; Thomas; Western Cherry
